text: Janusz Andrzej Dzięcioł (11 December 1953 – 6 December 2019)http://wiadomosci.gazeta.pl/wiadomosci/7,168571,25485248,janusz-dzieciol- nie-zyje-kim-byl-byly-posel-65-latek-zginal.html was a Polish politician. He was known as the winner of the first series of Big Brother. From 2007 until 2015, he was a member of Sejm of Poland from Toruń constituency. Between 2002 and 2007, he was a Grudziądz City Councillor. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Road accident deaths Category:Polish politicians Category:Television personalities
title: Janusz Dzięcioł
